nodes.name: Cogia Hassan
nodes.base_description: The pretended oil merchant.

nodes.base_description: A group of antagonists in the story.

nodes.base_description: The location where the captain goes early one morning.

nodes.base_description: A group of robbers that enter and exit the cave.

nodes.name: a large thick tree
nodes.base_description: The tree Ali Baba climbed to hide.

nodes.name: the branches
nodes.base_description: Branches where Ali Baba hid himself.

nodes.name: the portmanteaus
nodes.base_description: Loaded portmanteaus carried by the robbers.

nodes.name: the rock
nodes.base_description: The rock with the magic phrase 'Open, Sesame'.

nodes.name: Ali Baba counts forty of them
nodes.base_description: Ali Baba counts the number of robbers.

nodes.name: Each took a loaded portmanteau from his horse
nodes.base_description: The robbers take portmanteaus from their horses.

nodes.name: Ali Baba says 'Open, Sesame'
nodes.base_description: Ali Baba uses the magic phrase to open the door.

nodes.name: The door opens again
nodes.base_description: The door opens again to let the robbers out.

nodes.name: Ali Baba ventures down
nodes.base_description: Ali Baba descends from the tree.

nodes.name: Ali Baba approaches the rock
nodes.base_description: Ali Baba moves towards the magic rock.

nodes.name: The door flies
nodes.base_description: The door opens quickly when Ali Baba says 'Open, Sesame'.

nodes.name: Sesame
nodes.base_description: A magical word that opens a door.

nodes.name: He
nodes.base_description: The person who says 'Open, Sesame' and brings asses.

nodes.name: his asses
nodes.base_description: A group of animals brought by the character.

nodes.name: the cave
nodes.base_description: The cave that Cassim finds and enters using the secret word 'Open Sesame'.

nodes.name: quarters
nodes.base_description: The body of his brother cut into four pieces.

nodes.name: the body of his brother
nodes.base_description: The body of the person's brother that was found cut into quarters.

nodes.name: his brother
nodes.base_description: The deceased brother of the person who found his body.

nodes.name: a poor cobbler
nodes.base_description: A group that includes a poor cobbler who was led to sew the mangled limbs together.

nodes.name: Morgiana, a female slave in his brother's house
nodes.base_description: A female slave who sent the poor cobbler to sew the mangled limbs together.

nodes.name: two pieces of gold
nodes.base_description: Two items received by an unspecified character.

states.current_description: The state or ownership of the two pieces of gold changes after being led blindfolded.

nodes.name: was led blindfolded the same way back
nodes.base_description: An event involving someone being led back in a blindfolded state.

nodes.base_description: The house that Ali Baba took possession of.

nodes.base_description: A shop located opposite to Ali Baba's house.

nodes.name: The cobbler
nodes.base_description: A person who tells the captain about the job he had.

nodes.name: The robber
nodes.base_description: A person who marks Cassim's house with chalk.

nodes.name: The troop
nodes.base_description: A group led by the captain who is trying to find out the secret of entrance into his cave.

nodes.name: The cobbler telling the captain about his unspecified job
Buying nineteen mules and thirty-nine large jars

nodes.base_description: The captain's intention to find out the secret of entrance into his cave.

nodes.base_description: The captain disguising himself before going to the city.

nodes.base_description: The captain accosting the cobbler in the city.

nodes.name: Allowing himself to be blindfolded

nodes.base_description: The cobbler tracing out the house of Cassim.

nodes.base_description: Containers used to put the man.

nodes.base_description: The location where the thieves were buried.

nodes.name: First dish
nodes.base_description: The dish carried in by Morgiana.

nodes.base_description: Morgiana dances before the assembled company.

states.current_description: Performed at the parlor for Ali Baba and his guests.

nodes.name: Ali Baba rewards Morgiana
nodes.base_description: Ali Baba gives Morgiana in marriage to his son as a reward for her faithfulness.

nodes.name: Ali Baba's death and inheritance
nodes.base_description: At Ali Baba's death, Morgiana and his son inherit his immense wealth.

nodes.name: A dagger
nodes.base_description: The weapon used by Morgiana to kill Cogia Hassan.

edges.description: Ali Baba tells his brother the secret of the cave.
Ali Baba tells his brother the secret of the cave.
Cassim forgets the word that causes the door to open.
Ali Baba hears the sound of horses' feet, which he concludes to be the robbers.
The robbers put Cassim to death.
Ali Baba finds more treasures than he expected, which makes him forget the word that caused the door to open.
